label: insider_threat_05_dx_network_forensics_025
content:
## 2024-09-26 Daily Operations Summary

### Netflow Stats
- Total flows: 10833143
- Unique source IPs: 1540
- Unique destination IPs: 4503
- Average flow duration (sec): 37.7
- Top protocol TCP percentage: 79.8
- Top protocol UDP percentage: 12.9
- ICMP percentage: 0.8
- Long lived flows greater than 1 hour: 67
- East-West traffic percentage: 66.8

### Dns Query Analysis
- Total queries: 3409017
- Unique domains: 66173
- NXDOMAIN responses: 5056
- DGA suspected domains: 5
- DNS over HTTPS queries: 2799
- Average response time (ms): 2.6
- Cache hit percentage: 92.4
- TXT record queries: 583
- PTR queries: 6811

### Ids Ips Hits
- Total alerts: 784
- Blocked by IPS: 86
- Signature matches: 547
- Anomaly detections: 18
- Severity critical: 0
- Severity high: 17
- Severity medium: 70
- Severity low: 408
- False positive rate percentage: 17.6
- Top signatures:
  - ET SCAN SSH Brute Force Attempt
  - ET SCAN Nmap SYN Scan
  - ET POLICY curl User-Agent Outbound

### Bandwidth Utilization
- WAN inbound average (Gbps): 2.72
- WAN outbound average (Gbps): 3.42
- WAN peak (Gbps): 6.78
- LAN core utilization percentage: 54.8
- DMZ utilization percentage: 26.6
- VPN concentrator sessions: 179
- VPN bandwidth (Gbps): 2.31
- Top talker IP: 10.9.75.166
- Top talker bytes (GB): 34.0

### Bgp Changes
- Prefix announcements: 2
- Prefix withdrawals: 2
- AS path changes: 1
- Route flaps: 0
- Peer sessions established: 5
- Peer sessions down: 0
- Max prefix warnings: 1
- Communities changed: 2

### Tls Cert Transparency
- CT logs monitored: 3
- New entries for organization domains: 2
- Suspicious issuances: 1
- Expired certificates in use: 2
- TLS 1.0 connections: 11
- TLS 1.1 connections: 22
- TLS 1.2 connections: 44478
- TLS 1.3 connections: 155508
- Weak cipher usage: 3

### Infrastructure
#### netflow-collector-01
- CPU percentage: 42
- Memory percentage: 72
- Disk percentage: 72
#### dns-resolver-01
- CPU percentage: 26
- Memory percentage: 41
- Cache size (GB): 3.2
#### ids-sensor-01
- CPU percentage: 53
- Memory percentage: 59
- PPS: 93208
#### ids-sensor-02
- CPU percentage: 51
- Memory percentage: 62
- PPS: 99774
#### border-router-01
- CPU percentage: 34
- Memory percentage: 48
- Interface errors: 4

### Events
- IDS signature ET WEB_SERVER tuned: added exception for scanner
- Bandwidth: DMZ utilization at 91.9% capacity — capacity planning review
- TLS audit: expired cert on partner-gateway — waiver in place

### Notes
- Network monitoring daily report 2024-09-26. 10833143 flows analyzed. 3409017 DNS queries. 784 IDS alerts (0 critical, 17 high). WAN avg 2.72/3.42 Gbps in/out. 2 BGP announcements.
